MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  We are arranging to have engineers investigate the fault, and we hope to have your electricity restored by 31-OCT-2020 13:10.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a fault with the power in the LL58 postcode area of Beaumaris. This is causing reduced power to a number of properties. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10:58AM. Our engineers have isolated supplies to further properties due to reports of a grounded overhead line. Our engineer is en route to investigate and our team will work to get your power back to normal as quickly and as safely as possible by 1.15PM. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:37AM on 31st October 2020
